0.3.1.en: Fix: state 'playlists.playlistList' doesn't refresh after the playlist changed via app
0.3.1.de: Behoben: state 'playlists.playlistList' wird nicht aktualisiert wenn die Playlist via App geändert wurde
0.3.1.ru: Исправление: состояние 'playlists.playlistList' не обновляется после изменения плейлиста с помощью приложения
0.3.1.pt: Correção: o estado 'playlists.playlistList' não é atualizado depois que a playlist foi alterada por meio do aplicativo
0.3.1.fr: Correction: l'état 'playlists.playlistList' ne s'actualise pas après la modification de la playlist via l'application
0.3.1.nl: Fix: status 'playlists.playlistList' wordt niet vernieuwd nadat de afspeellijst via de app is gewijzigd

0.3.0.en:
Change playlist and device state names from name to id
New states for device selection: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.availableDeviceListIds', 'devices.availableDeviceListString'
New states for playlist selection: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Add option to avoid shuffle state reset on some devices after starting a playlist
0.3.0.de:
Playlist und Geräte Statenamen von Name in Id geändert
Neue States zur Geräteauswahl: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.availableDeviceListIds', 'devices.availableDeviceListString'
Neue States zur Playlistauswahl: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Option hinzufügt, um das Zurücksetzen von Shuffle auf einigen Geräten zu verhinden, beim starten einer Playlist
0.3.0.ru:
Изменение имен плейлиста и состояний устройства с имени на id
Новые состояния для выбора устройства: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.availableDeviceListIds', 'devices.availableDeviceListString'
Новые состояния для выбора плейлиста: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Добавить параметр, чтобы избежать сброса состояния в случайном порядке на некоторых устройствах после запуска списка воспроизведения
0.3.0.pt:
Alterar nomes de estado de listas de reprodução e dispositivos de nome para id
Novos estados para a seleção de dispositivos: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.availableDeviceListIds', 'devices.availableDeviceListString'
Novos estados para seleção de playlists: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Adicionar opção para evitar redefinição de estado aleatório em alguns dispositivos depois de iniciar uma lista de reprodução
0.3.0.fr:
Changer la liste de lecture et les noms d'état de l'appareil du nom à l'identifiant
Nouveaux états pour la sélection de périphérique: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.availableDeviceListIds', 'devices.availableDeviceListString'
Nouveaux états pour la sélection de playlist: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Ajouter une option pour éviter la réinitialisation de l'état aléatoire sur certains appareils après le démarrage d'une liste de lecture
0.3.0.nl:
Wijzig afspeellijst en apparaatstatusnamen van naam in id
Nieuwe toestanden voor apparaatselectie: 'devices.deviceList', 'devices.deviceListIds', 'devices.deviceListString', 'devices.available Device ListIds', 'devices.available Device ListString'
Nieuwe staten voor afspeellijstselectie: 'playlists.playlistList', 'playlists.playlistListIds', 'playlists.playlistListString', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListIds', 'playlists.yourPlaylistListString'
Optie toevoegen om shuffle-status opnieuw in te stellen op sommige apparaten na het starten van een afspeellijst

0.2.5.en: Fix: 'playlists.YourPlaylistName.playThisList' starts always with second track
0.2.5.ru: Исправление: 'playlists.YourPlaylistName.playThisList' всегда начинается со второго трека
0.2.5.pt: Correção: 'playlists.YourPlaylistName.playThisList' inicia sempre com a segunda faixa
0.2.5.fr: Correction: 'playlists.YourPlaylistName.playThisList' commence toujours avec la deuxième piste
0.2.5.nl: Fix: 'playlists.YourPlaylistName.playThisList' begint altijd met tweede nummer

0.2.4.en: remove special character ("'*) from device and playlist state names
0.2.4.de: Sonderzeichen ("'*) in Geräte- und Playlistnamen entfernt
0.2.4.ru: Специальные символы ("'*) В именах устройств и списков воспроизведения удалены
0.2.4.pt: Caracteres especiais ("'*) Em nomes de dispositivos e listas de reprodução removidos
0.2.4.fr: Caractères spéciaux ("'*) Dans les noms de périphériques et de listes de lecture supprimés
0.2.4.nl: Speciale tekens ("'*) Verwijderde apparaat- en afspeellijstnamen

0.2.3.en: remove special character (,?[]) from device and playlist state names
0.2.3.de: Sonderzeichen (,?[]) in Geräte- und Playlistnamen entfernt
0.2.3.ru: Специальные символы (,? []) В именах устройств и списков воспроизведения удалены
0.2.3.pt: Caracteres especiais (,? []) Em nomes de dispositivos e listas de reprodução removidos
0.2.3.fr: Caractères spéciaux (,? []) Dans les noms de périphériques et de listes de lecture supprimés
0.2.3.nl: Speciale tekens (,? []) Verwijderde apparaat- en afspeellijstnamen

0.2.2.en: 'playbackInfo.playlist.track*' States are only reset when changed
0.2.2.de: 'playbackInfo.playlist.track*' States werden nur bei Änderung neu gesetzt
0.2.2.pt: 'playbackInfo.playlist.track*' Estados só são redefinidos quando alterados
0.2.2.fr: Les états 'playbackInfo.playlist.track*' ne sont réinitialisés que lorsqu'ils sont modifiés
0.2.2.nl: 'playbackInfo.playlist.track *' Staten worden alleen gereset als ze worden gewijzigd

0.2.1.en: change state 'player.shuffle' to string with possible values 'on' and 'off'
0.2.1.de: State 'player.shuffle' in String geändert, mit möglichen Werten 'on' und 'off'
0.2.1.ru: Состояние 'player.shuffle' было изменено на строку с возможными значениями 'on' и 'off'
0.2.1.pt: O estado 'player.shuffle' foi alterado para uma string, com os possíveis valores 'on' e 'off'
0.2.1.fr: L'état 'player.shuffle' a été changé en chaîne, avec les valeurs possibles 'on' et 'off'
0.2.1.nl: De status 'player.shuffle' is gewijzigd in een tekenreeks, met de mogelijke waarden 'on' en 'off'

0.1.3.pt: adaptado para a mudança da API do Spotify
0.1.3.fr: adapté à la modification de l'API Spotify

0.1.2.en:
automatic updating of devices and playlists (configurable in the adapter)
new state Devices.DEVICE.is_available indicates if a device is available
shows warning message http 202 only as debug and only one time
the States Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId and Player.Volume also show the current value
new states Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
marks the state PlaybackInfo.image_url as deprecated. Will not be included in a new installation and will not be updated in future versions
changing the State Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID now works like in Lucky's script
0.1.2.de:
automatische Aktualisieren der Geräte und Playlisten (im Adapter konfigurierbar)
neuer State Devices.GERÄT.is_available zeigt an ob ein Gerät verfügbar ist
zeigt Warnmeldung http 202 nur noch als debug und nur noch einmal an
die States Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId und Player.Volume zeigen ebenfalls den aktuellen Wert an
neue States Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
den State PlaybackInfo.image_url als deprecated markiert. Wird bei Neuinstallation nicht mehr mit angelegt und in zukünftigen Versionen nicht mehr aktualisiert
das Ändern des State Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID funktioniert nun wie in Luckys Skript
0.1.2.ru:
автоматическое обновление устройств и списков воспроизведения (настраивается в адаптере)
новое состояние Devices.DEVICE.is_available указывает, доступно ли устройство
показывает предупреждающее сообщение http 202 только как отладочное и только одно время
States Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId и Player.Volume также показывают текущее значение
новые состояния Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
отмечает состояние PlaybackInfo.image_url как устаревшее. Не будет включен в новую установку и не будет обновляться в будущих версиях
изменение состояния Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID теперь работает, как в сценарии Lucky
0.1.2.pt:
atualização automática de dispositivos e listas de reprodução (configurável no adaptador)
novo estado Devices.DEVICE.is_available indica se um dispositivo está disponível
mostra mensagem de aviso http 202 apenas como depuração e apenas uma vez
os Estados Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId e Player.Volume também mostram o valor atual
novos estados Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
marca o estado PlaybackInfo.image_url como obsoleto. Não será incluído em uma nova instalação e não será atualizado em versões futuras
alterar o estado Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID agora funciona como no script de Lucky
0.1.2.fr:
mise à jour automatique des appareils et des listes de lecture (configurable dans l'adaptateur)
le nouvel état Devices.DEVICE.is_available indique si un périphérique est disponible
affiche le message d'avertissement http 202 uniquement en tant que débogage et une seule fois
les états Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId et Player.Volume affichent également la valeur actuelle
nouveaux états Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
marque l'état PlaybackInfo.image_url comme obsolète. Ne sera pas inclus dans une nouvelle installation et ne sera pas mis à jour dans les futures versions
changer l'état Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID fonctionne maintenant comme dans le script de Lucky
0.1.2.nl:
automatische update van apparaten en afspeellijsten (configureerbaar in de adapter)
nieuwe status Devices.DEVICE.is_available geeft aan of een apparaat beschikbaar is
toont waarschuwingsbericht http 202 alleen als foutopsporing en slechts één keer
de States Player.Shuffle, Player.Playlist_ID, Player.TrackId en Player.Volume tonen ook de huidige waarde
nieuwe staten Afspeellijsten.PLAYLISTNAME.image_url, PlaybackInfo.Playlist_image_url, PlaybackInfo.Album_image_url
markeert de staat PlaybackInfo.image_url als verouderd. Wordt niet opgenomen in een nieuwe installatie en zal niet worden bijgewerkt in toekomstige versies
het wijzigen van de staat Playlists.PLAYLISTNAME.Track_ID werkt nu zoals in Lucky's script

0.1.0.pt: Mecanismo de pesquisa de retrabalho api

0.0.9.en:
new state 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' with possible values: off, context, track
new state 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' with possible values: true, false
states for the playing device will also updated in 5s intervals
states in 'PlaybackInfo' are now updated also if no device is active playing
states in 'PlaybackInfo' are now cleared if no device is available
loading new playlists if playing the first time
0.0.9.de:
neuer State 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' mit möglichen Werten: off, context, track
neuer State 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' mit möglichen Werten: true, false
States für das abspielende Gerät werden ebenfalls in 5s-Intervallen aktualisiert
States in 'PlaybackInfo' werden jetzt auch aktualisiert, wenn kein Gerät aktiv ist
States in 'PlaybackInfo' werden jetzt gelöscht, wenn kein Gerät verfügbar ist
neue Playlisten werden beim ersten Abspielen nachgeladen
0.0.9.ru:
новое состояние 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' с возможными значениями: off, context, track
новое состояние 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' с возможными значениями: true, false
состояния для игрового устройства также будут обновляться через 5 секунд
состояния в 'PlaybackInfo' теперь обновляются также, если никакое устройство не активно
состояния в 'PlaybackInfo' теперь очищаются, если устройство недоступно
загрузка новых плейлистов, если вы играете в первый раз
0.0.9.pt:
novo estado 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' com valores possíveis: off, context, track
novo estado 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' com valores possíveis: true, false
os estados para o dispositivo de reprodução também serão atualizados em intervalos de 5 s
estados em 'PlaybackInfo' agora são atualizados também se nenhum dispositivo estiver ativo
os estados em 'PlaybackInfo' estão agora desmarcados se nenhum dispositivo estiver disponível
carregando novas listas de reprodução se estiver reproduzindo a primeira vez
0.0.9.fr:
nouvel état 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' avec des valeurs possibles: off, context, track
nouvel état 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' avec les valeurs possibles: true, false
les états de l'appareil de jeu seront également mis à jour par intervalles de 5 secondes
les états dans 'PlaybackInfo' sont maintenant mis à jour également si aucun périphérique n'est actif
les états dans 'PlaybackInfo' sont maintenant effacés si aucun périphérique n'est disponible
chargement de nouvelles playlists si vous jouez la première fois
0.0.9.nl:
nieuwe status 'PlaybackInfo.repeat' met mogelijke waarden: uit, context, track
nieuwe status 'PlaybackInfo.shuffle' met mogelijke waarden: true, false
toestanden voor het afspeelapparaat worden ook bijgewerkt in intervallen van 5 seconden
staten in 'PlaybackInfo' worden nu ook bijgewerkt als er geen apparaat actief is
staten in 'PlaybackInfo' worden nu gewist als er geen apparaat beschikbaar is
nieuwe afspeellijsten laden als deze de eerste keer worden afgespeeld

0.0.8.en:
new option to delete no longer existing devices and playlists
load complete playlists
0.0.8.de:
Neue Option zum Löschen nicht mehr vorhandener Devices und Playlisten
Playlisten werden nun komplett geladen
0.0.8.ru:
новая опция для удаления уже существующих устройств и плейлистов
Плейлисты теперь полностью загружены
0.0.8.pt:
nova opção para excluir mais dispositivos e listas de reprodução existentes
As listas de reprodução estão agora completamente carregadas
0.0.8.fr:
nouvelle option pour supprimer les appareils et les listes de lecture existants
Les listes de lecture sont maintenant complètement chargées
0.0.8.nl:
nieuwe optie om niet langer bestaande apparaten en afspeellijsten te verwijderen
Afspeellijsten zijn nu volledig geladen

0.0.7.fr: Correction: mise à jour automatique des jetons

0.0.5.en: fix: fatal error if no open player
0.0.5.de: Behoben: Adapter Absturz wenn kein Player geöffnet ist
0.0.5.ru: Исправлено: сбой адаптера при отсутствии игрока
0.0.5.pt: Corrigido: queda do adaptador quando nenhum jogador está aberto
0.0.5.fr: Réparé: l'adaptateur tombe en panne quand aucun joueur n'est ouvert
0.0.5.nl: Opgelost: Adapter crash wanneer geen speler open is

0.0.4.en:
check configuration
fix: adapter configuration in admin2
fix: restart after authorization need
0.0.4.de:
Konfiguration überprüfen
Behoben: Adapter Konfiguration in admin2
Behoben: Neustart nach Autorisation nicht mehr nötig
0.0.4.ru:
Проверьте конфигурацию
Исправлено: Конфигурация адаптера в admin2
Исправлено: Перезапуск после авторизации больше не нужен
0.0.4.pt:
Verifique a configuração
Corrigido: configuração do adaptador em admin2
Corrigido: reiniciar após a autorização, não é mais necessário
0.0.4.fr:
Vérifier la configuration Corrigé: Configuration de l'adaptateur dans admin2
Correction: Redémarrage après l'autorisation n'est plus nécessaire
0.0.4.nl:
Controleer de configuratie
Opgelost: adapterconfiguratie in admin2; Opgelost: opnieuw opstarten na autorisatie niet meer nodig

common.name: Commands to control playback related to the playlist
Commands to control playback related to the current active device
Available playlist saved in common part. Change this value to a userId-playlistId to start this playlist.
contains list of playlist ids as string, pattern: userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;...
contains list of playlists as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of your playlist ids as string, pattern: userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;...
contains list of your playlists as string, patter: name;name;name;...
All devices saved in common part. Change this value to a device id to start playing on this.
contains list of all device ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
contains list of all devices as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of available device ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
contains list of available devices as string, patter: name;name;name;...
set track id to play this track; switch the context to track
set track no of playlist to play this track; 0-based, put 0 for the first track
set playlist id to play; in combination with player.playlist.owner, if it is empty the authorized user will be used; first set player.playlist.owner, then player.playlist.id
set playlist owner to start playlist in combination with player.playlist.id; first set player.playlist.owner, then player.playlist.id
paste here the redirect url of the authorization url
get playlists owned by authorized user
artist name; comma separated if multiple artists
artist image url of the first available artist if multiple artists
image url of the current context; album, artist or playlist
Tracks of the playlist saved in common part. Change this value to a track position number to start this playlist with this track.
contains list of tracks as string, patter: 0;1;2;...
contains list of tracks as string, patter: title - artist;title - artist;title - artist;...
contains list of tracks as string with position, pattern: 0:title - artist;1:title - artist;2:title - artist;...
contains list of track ids as string with position, pattern: 0:id;1:id;2:id;...
contains list of track ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...

contains list of tracks as array object, pattern: [{id: "id", title: "title", artistName: "artistName1, artistName2", artistArray: [{id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, {id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, ...], album: {id: "albumId", name: "albumName"}, durationMs: 253844, duration: 4:13, addedAt: 15395478261235, addedBy: "userId", discNumber: 1, episode: false, explicit: false, popularity: 56}, ...]
it is not possible to control restricted devices with the adapter
